name: Fenrir
description: I dream of chocolate. Can I believe that this is real?

set.2: Increase crit damage by **14%**/15%/16%/18%. This effect does not stack. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: When dealing volt damage, increase final damage by **2.75%** for **10** seconds, stacking up to **5**/6/7/8 times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
